data.title: National Bank of Oman Joyalukkas Jewellery
data.text:
Discount is applicable on NBO Debit, Credit and Badeel Prepaid Cards at Joyalukkas Jewellery.

The offer is not in conjunction with any other shop extra discounts, discount vouchers, other promotional offers or any special promotions running at the store.

The offer should be availed at the time of purchase and only against a single invoice.

The making charges discount offer is from the making charge mentioned in the product tag price.

Customers should present the valid ID copy.

Offer cannot be redeemed in cash.

Offer is not applicable on gold coins, gold bars, 24k gold products, Loose Diamonds & Pearls or any promotional items.

Offer valid from 1st Mar 2024 to 30th April 2024.

Promotion is not applicable on corporate card, UAE cards or any other cards not mentioned above.

Applicable on all transactions processed on POS machines.

Not applicable for cash transactions.â€‹
